ingredients: 2 (20 ounce) cans crushed pineapple, drained, 1 cup all-purpose flour, 1 cup brown sugar, 1 teaspoon baking powder,   +   1/2 teaspoon salt, 1  egg,   +   1/2 cup butter, melted, 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon
nutrition: Total Fat 8g 11%, Saturated Fat 5g 25%, Cholesterol 32mg 11%, Sodium 192mg 8%, Total Carbohydrate 35g 13%, Dietary Fiber 1g 4%, Total Sugars 25g, Protein 2g, Vitamin C 9mg 45%, Calcium 49mg 4%, Iron 1mg 5%, Potassium 150mg 3%
